manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The steamer is designed for American voltage standard, only applicable to 110V voltage. Please use a transformer which can convert voltage to 110V when using this steamer abroad. Do not immerse the appliance in water or any other liquids to damage the unit.

Make Your Life Easier With OGHom Handheld Steamer NOTE: * The steamer is designed for American voltage standard, only applicable to 110V voltage. * Water over Max line may cause water leakage. Please make sure the water is lower than Max line. * Any tilting of the steamer while working may cause water leakage or spurting out. Please make sure you hold the steamer upright while using it to steam fabrics. * Any other chemical substance added to the water may cause water spurting out from the nozzle. Distilled or purified water must be used to prevent water spurting out. * If tap water is used, please dump all the water out after each usage and do not reuse the water. * Steam coming out from the nozzle can be very hot. Please never use the steamer on clothes that you are wearing on yourself or pointing the nozzle against any human or pet. * If water is spurting out, there is probably some residue in the water tank. Please clean it with vinegar or lemon water (Suggested ratio : water to vinegar: 8 :2. Water to lemon: 7:3 ). Dump the water after boiling.

SPECIFICATION: Unit Weight (Bare): 0.568kg. Water Tank Capacity: 240ml. Steam Output Time: 130 seconds. Steam Duration: 14-16 minutes. Wattage: 700W. Voltage: 110-120V, 50/60Hz. Warm Tips: Please use a transformer which can convert voltage to 110V when using this steamer abroad.

SPECIFICATION: Unit Weight (Bare): 0.568kg. Water Tank Capacity: 240ml. Steam Output Time: 130 seconds. Steam Duration: 14-16 minutes. Wattage: 700W. Voltage: 110-120V, 50/60Hz. Warm Tips: Please use a transformer which can convert voltage to 110V when using this steamer abroad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and Efficient Handheld Garment Steamer!
reviews.reviewText: This steamer has become my go-to solution for quickly and effortlessly removing wrinkles from my clothing. This handheld garment steamer is a game-changer, providing a hassle-free way to keep my clothes looking fresh and wrinkle-free.One of the standout features of this steamer is its portability. The compact and lightweight design makes it easy to handle and store, making it ideal for both home and travel use. With its 240ml water tank, I can steam multiple garments without needing frequent refills, which is a time-saving convenience.The steamer heats up rapidly, allowing me to start steaming in no time. The powerful steam output efficiently smoothens out wrinkles and creases, even on thicker fabrics like jeans and linens. I find it to be a much quicker and more effective alternative to traditional irons, especially for delicate fabrics that require gentle care.Another aspect that impressed me is the ease of use. The steamer features a simple on/off switch and doesn't require any complicated setup or assembly. It's user-friendly, and the ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip during use. The long power cord provides ample reach, allowing me to steam my clothes without being restricted by the outlet's location.As someone who travels frequently, I appreciate the versatility of this steamer. It works wonders on both clothing and household items like curtains and upholstery. It's a practical and space-saving tool that has proven to be invaluable during my trips.The steamer's safety features, such as the automatic shut-off when the water level is low or when it becomes too hot, give me peace of mind while using it. I never have to worry about leaving it unattended.In terms of durability, the steamer has proven to be a reliable companion. The build quality is sturdy, and it has held up well over time, even with regular use.In conclusion, the steamer is a must-have addition to any household. Its convenience, efficiency, and portability make it an excellent investment for keeping your clothes wrinkle-free and looking their best. Whether you're at home or on the go, this handheld garment steamer is a game-changer that will simplify your daily routine and ensure you always step out in well-pressed attire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have not owned a steamer or iron in years and decided I needed to pull the trigger. This is a great steamer. I love the size- its easy to put away. It works great and is easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This steamer worked great and just had a small amount of leakage. It is lightweight and easy to use! Definitely a good choice for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little thing works great and holds a good amount of water too! The con is the size, it's a bit bulky for traveling. I use this at home though and the size for at-home use is perfect. The top piece comes off to make it more compact and you get attachments that are useful. It's a medium size versus compact so you can take it along with you while traveling, but think of it being the same size as a full size hair dryer. This works well and fast at taking out the wrinkles though so it does exactly what it says its going to do. Good steam output and heats up fast. It's a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This steamer came on time. It was nicely packaged and came with all pieces in brand new, perfect condition. I do not like to iron so I bought this to replace ironing. This product is awesome and it does a great job of getting wrinkles out of clothing and curtains, and any other type of products like that. I’ve had some clothes that were pretty wrinkled, and I put them on a hanger. Turn this on and get the wrinkles out very nicely. I was shocked at how good this thing works. it’s a small steamer. It has one button. Basically you fill the steamer up to your desired amount with water. Then you plug it in and turn on the orange button. There is only one button and I usually wait till I see steam coming out of the top. All I do is run the steamer along with the clothes and it works well. I go over it a few times and you do not have to touch the clothing with the steamer, it has an attachment that has a brush you can use as well. It also has a little cup that you can use to fill it up with. It’s small enough that you could bring it with you on trips or vacations to get the wrinkles out of your clothes that were in a suitcase. I really like this steamer. It was a great price and I highly recommend. This can definitely replace ironing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heats up fast
reviews.reviewText: It’s easy to use, fill and the cord is long which is helpful in my closet. However, to use this steamer, you have to stay on task as it heats up very quickly. You’ll see the steam start as soon as the heating up noise quiets down a bit. You’ll see the water boiling in the bottle. My issue with it is that it wets the clothes far too quickly. If you’re steaming something you’re going to wear soon, make sure you have time to let the wet spots dry. The steamer starts spewing water within just a couple mins after you start seeing the steam come out so you have to operate quickly. I couldn’t get past my dress to do my husband’s shirt because of how much water was coming out. I had to turn it off let it cool for a few mins and then start it back up, but even then it still spewed some water on his shirt. i had to let it dry so that he didn’t walk out with water spots on his chest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works so far 💪
reviews.reviewText: Right out the box, works great as advertised. Steams fast & did good on a very wrinkled & hardshirt to iron. No leaking from steamer. Warning it gets very hot 🔥, that's what I want it to do.So far very satisfied, hope it outlasts my iron 🤣.I will recommend this product💯

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality steamer
reviews.reviewText: Does what it’s supposed to do. Doesn’t spit or anything. Heats up pretty quick and not too big so not bad to travel with.

reviews.reviewTitle: If I could give it 0 stars I would because it DOES NOT WORK at all, doesn’t even heat the water
reviews.reviewText: No me gusto por el simple hecho que no funciona, literal ni siquiera caliente el agua mucho menos ayuda a planchar algo, una perdida de dinero, de los peores productos que he comprado en Amazon

I never thought I'd see such a difference between this hand held steamer and the iron!What takes around 10 minutes for wrinkled clothes, I'm able to do it in under 2-3 minutes max. And it is still shocking for me in a good way.Although it is portable and easy to use, i feel that there are some things to take note of:1. One should be very careful with the high heated steam while using it2. Although a lot of people have mentioned it as lightweight, it becomes a little straining in the hand when you do it for more than 10 minutes straight3. Little inconvenient when it comes to being safe and doing it right for shirts especially but ultimately with some struggle, gets my job done.4. The water capacity is only enough for like 2- 3 shirts max. You gotta wait until it cools down to refill the water.I would definitely recommend this for anyone who is looking for on-the-fly ironing :)

Bought this for a wedding. It works alright, not great. Takes a lot of passes to get it wrinkle free and I found that it would spit out water sometimes regardless of whether it was held straight or not. It is a good size for travelling and will eventually get the job done.
This works fantastic and is compact so I can bring it anywhere!
Very handy but wish there was a lever to regulate. Clothes get wet during use
